mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO atd_clock_in_records ( hr_code, full_name, clock_in_date, day_of_week, clock_in_info, create_time, analyzed ) VALUES
( #{item.hrCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fullName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE(#{item.clockInDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{item.dayOfWeek, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clockInInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(clock_in_date, '%Y') 'year', DATE_FORMAT(clock_in_date, '%m') 'month' from atd_clock_in_records where analyzed = 0
select su.user_name, clock_in_info from atd_clock_in_records acir left join sys_user su on su.full_name = acir.full_name where DATE_FORMAT(clock_in_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}
